trans-unit.source: The object where the event handler is attached.

Represents the method that will handle the routed events related to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager" /> classes, for example <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.TextInput" />.
This delegate is used with the following attached events:
trans-unit.target: Este delegado é usado com os seguintes eventos anexados:

trans-unit.source: This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements.
trans-unit.target: Este delegado também é usado com os seguintes eventos roteados em elementos de base.

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward some of the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Esses eventos roteados encaminham alguns dos eventos anexados listados anteriormente para torná-los mais acessível para o modelo de elemento geral em [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: Os eventos anexados e os eventos roteado de elemento base compartilham seus dados de evento e bolha e túnel versões dos eventos roteados também compartilham dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode afetar as características manipuladas do evento conforme ela se desloca a rota de evento.
Para obter detalhes, consulte [visão geral de entrada](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
